title: Huge FPS drop when I die
body:
Hi, I've recently encountered a problem where everytime I'm about to die my FPS drops completely. I run at a steady 116 FPS and use a GEForce 1060 that I recently just bought. Before I got my 1060, I used a 460 and never had this problem. Despite this correlation, I think that the issue is with some software not the hardware switch. I tried uninstalling a bunch of programs that might have been doing weird stuff (any free antivirus stuff) and a PlaysTv program to record my games. 

Do you have any suggestions on what can fix my problem. I'll add any necessary info about my software.

replies.body: Since you just recently upgraded to this card, that fps drop might be caused by an outdated driver. Let's be sure you've updated that new card so that you can use it to it's fullest! If you're a little iffy on how to do that, there's a section in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq1)) that can help you along!
